error_repo_exists: A %s repository with this name (%s) already exists. Please choose another title for your %s.
error_occurred: An error has occurred while querying %s. Please try again later.
error_repo_creation: The repository at %s could not be created. Please try again later.
error_setup_remote: Could not set up remote. Please try again later.
error_completing_setup: An error has prevented the setup completion.
error_buffer: Could not load buffer for site(s): %s
error_delete_single_post: You cannot delete your only post. Create another post before deleting this one.
error_delete_root_post: You cannot delete the site index. Please edit it instead
warn_delete_post_with_children: At least one selected post contains children. These will be deleted as well. Continue?
warn_delete_sites: You're about to delete the selected sites from the local PRSS configuration. This CANNOT be undone. Continue?
warn_delete_menus: You're about to delete one or more menus from the local PRSS configuration. Continue?
error_save_text_editor: You can't save while using the HTML editor. Please switch back to the rich text editor or enable "Force Raw HTML Editing" under "More Settings".
error_preview_text_editor: You can't toggle the Preview mode while using the HTML editor. Please switch back to the rich text editor or enable "Force Raw HTML Editing" under "More Settings".
preview_description_message: Preview your site in your browser
rebuild_description_message: Rebuild this site in the buffer
error_invalid_slug: Your slug is either already used or not acceptable. Please choose another.
github_token_info_1: A Github token with "repo" permissions is required.
github_token_info_2: Your token will be stored locally in your OS keychain (secure store).
github_repo_info_1: If you'll be using your own repository to serve your site, enter the repository name.
github_repo_info_2: If you're connecting to someone else's repository, use the username/repository syntax.
github_repo_info_3: Before proceeding, please ensure that you can access the repository locally through Git.
warn_force_raw_html_disable: If you go back to the Rich Text Editor, your markup will be parsed. This will cause classes, attributes and unsaved changes to be LOST! Continue?
theme_default_hero_message: This is your PRSS site. Feel free to add new content and customize to your heart's desire. Happy publishing.
config_path_changed: Config path changed! PRSS will restart in 3 seconds...
site_cfg_id_missing: Your site must have an id

site_cfg_url_missing: Your site must have an URL
site_cfg_url_error: Your site must have a valid URL
theme_mgr_reqtheme: Your site must have a theme
build_theme_parseerr: There was an error parsing the template for post id (%s)
site_cfg_dir_prev: The directory does not exist yet. Please preview or deploy your site
site_slug_val: The slug must have a value
site_slug_protected: This slug value (%s) is a system default. It cannot be edited.
slug_existing: There is already an item with the same slug (%s) at this position. Please change the slug or drop elsewhere
no_clone_root: You cannot clone the root post. Please unselect it and try again.
title_missing: The title must have a value
slug_missing: URL Slug error. Please provide a URL Slug for your post or choose a different title.
enable_pages_error: Could not enable Github Pages on this repository.
enable_pages_branch_error: The default branch for the repository could not be found.
